item.title: exploring single sign-on design
item.description: -- Understanding establishing context The currently deployed sign-on systems, ONe-key and Public Secure Pilot, have not met the expectations of the Ontario government’s program areas, as shown by high call centre volumes and low adoption rates of digital services. From that point of understanding, we then conducted research with program area stakeholders and members of the public to tangibly define existing problems and public expectations respectively.

item.title: reimagining the renter experience
item.description: -- Product exploration emphasizing contextual problem solving While the stress, excitement and emotional complexities of finding a place to live in are hard to emulate without first-hand experience, performing a deep dive into listing exploration features and a few too many NYC apartment hunting YouTube videos allowed me to grasp the problem Zumper is trying to solve.
